resources.string: Discard your changes and quit editing?
To add a reminder please calculate and save a loan and click on the reminder button on the Saved loans panel"
To save a loan please calculate and click on the save button"
Get financing quotes before you go to the dealership
Keep the term as short as you can afford
Pay for taxes and extras with cash
Unlike mortgages or a credit card, you can usually get a car loan even if you have pretty bad credit—you’ll just pay (a lot) more since banks can easily repossess the car
Try online lenders. You complete a credit application and are presented with your interest rate and a max amount you can spend.
Shorter loan terms come with lower interest rates but higher monthly payments. And that’s what you want.
In addition to a short loan term, you can avoid a situation in which you owe more money than the car is worth by putting money down.
Do not finance the miscellaneous expenses involved in your vehicle purchase like extended warranties.
